parse: Hebrew Word
str2: Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Demonstrative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Noun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: A mountain, hill. Probably from an obsolete oro; a mountain: -hill, mount(-ain).

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Article - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Probably prolonged from hals; the sea.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From dia and krino; to separate thoroughly, i.e. to withdraw from, or oppose; figuratively, to discriminate, or hesitate.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Conjunction
str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
